alert.note: Alert for Allen; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 10:22PM EST until February 04 at 1:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches by Thursday evening. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and northwest Ohio. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to become moderate to light tonight, but pick back up in intensity later tonight as another wave comes back in. Additional accumulations of 4 to 7 inches can be expected along with blowing and drifting of snow on east to west and mainly rural roads.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
